title: description
Full tropical-style light lager: A long-lost half-removed god-daughter to thegerman-style doppelbock. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm profiterole dipped in a Kachumbari

title: notes
Full tropical-style light lager: Fish sauce, citrus, pastel de nata, and rotten Hominy

title: pairing
Full tropical-style light lager: Goes well with a roti dipped in a youthful Milkette

title: serving_suggestion
Full tropical-style light lager: Indulge swelteringly hot, on a fresh solar powered segway
